Class BibTeXImporter¶

class app.impex.BibTeXImporter(path, manager)[source]¶

Bases: app.impex.Importer

Import entries L{Entries<app.entry.Entry>} from a BibTeX file.

__init__(path, manager)[source]¶

@type path: L{str} @param path: The path to a file. @type manager: list of L{app.manager.ReferenceManager} @param manager: The reference manager that will hold the entry list.

add(entry)[source]¶

Shorthand to remove code duplication

importFile()[source]¶

Import from a BibTeX file. @rtype: L{int} @return: The total number of entries successfully exported. @raise Exception: If an error occurred during the export process.
